search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Revv (revv.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I couldn't locate an exact URL for the official pricing page of Revv directly on their website. You might need to explore their contact or product-specific sections further at [revv.com](https://www.revv.com). Let me know if you'd like assistance with another query!

extracted_content.content:
Raise More. Work Less.
----------------------

Revv is a lead optimization and donation platform that increases engagement and maximizes your fundraising.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

blob-form

We’re obsessed with boosting conversion rates.
----------------------------------------------

#### [One Click Donations](https://www.revv.com/#best-oc)

Our One-Click technology automatically remembers users across all organizations that use Revv. Our huge pool of Revv users can donate or sign petitions with just one click and boost your conversions tremendously.

#### [Forms, Petitions, & Surveys](https://www.revv.com/#best-leads)

Create unlimited forms, petitions, and surveys for your marketing campaigns. Once they complete this step you can direct them to a donation form with their information pre-filled.

[Learn More](https://revv.com/features/petition-pages/)

#### [Meticulous Mobile Optimization](https://www.revv.com/#best-applepay)

Today, most donors are giving on mobile.  Features like address autocomplete, Apple Pay and Google Wallet will dramatically boost your conversion rates because it’s much quicker for donors to complete the process on their phones.

#### [Upsell Your Donors](https://www.revv.com/#best-upsell)

Ask users to take additional action while you have their attention: become a monthly recurring donor, buy a product and more. We’ve seen 15 – 20% of donors accept at least one upsell.

#### [Text To Donate](https://www.revv.com/#best-mobile)

Grow your list with SMS opt-ins and then deploy our SMS Reply To Donate Technology allowing donors to just respond “Yes” to process a donation to your organization.

[Learn More](https://revv.com/features/sms-reply-to-donate-text-message-donations/)

With 1000+ integrations, you can quickly deploy Revv with the platforms you love.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the toolkit power fundraisers dream about.
--------------------------------------------------

![Image 1](https://s33396.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/power-tool.png)

### Donor Management

Revv’s easy to use platform allows your cause to manage donors with a breeze. Need to cancel someone’s recurring plan or issue a refund? No problem! Control how you communicate with your donors by using our custom receipt builder so you can personalize what your donors see.

[Learn More](https://revv.com/features/donor-management/)

### Data The Way You Want It

Revv makes reporting easy for your donor management, marketing, finance or compliance teams. Start with customizable fields and columns and filter the data however you want. Integrated with over 1000+ platforms, you can manage how your data is sent to specific people or APIs in realtime or on a custom schedule.

[Learn More](https://revv.com/features/political-compliance/)

### Customizable Styling

Revv is jam-packed with options for custom branding that matches your organization’s identity with control over colors, photos, layout, fields, and domain name. Fine tune how your page will display on mobile or Facebook and Twitter to optimize your marketing efforts and even use your own CSS.

[Learn More](https://revv.com/features/page-builder/)

### Agency Tools to Manage Clients

Revv’s agency features allow you to manage numerous clients or child organizations in one easy-to-use dashboard. You can easily create new organizations for upcoming campaigns or new clients and take a cut of donations on a page by page basis. We work extremely closely with our agency partners.

[Learn More](https://revv.com/agencies/)

Get Started Today
-----------------

Free for the basics, $49 per month for Pro features.

### Revv

**Free Monthly**

Get access to all of our basic fundraising features and start raising money.

Credit Card Processing Fee:

4% + 30c per transaction

[Get Started For Free](https://app.revv.co/sign_up)

### Revv Pro

**$49 Monthly** Popular

Get Revv’s full suite of tools and integrations for power fundraisers.

Credit Card Processing Fee:

4% + 30c per transaction

[Sign Up Now](https://app.revv.co/sign_up)

### Revv Enterprise

**Let's Talk**

Enterprise is best suited for large organizations with multiple chapters and agencies with numerous clients.

[Contact Us](https://revv.com/contact/enterprise)

Revv's donation maximization features like marketing automation and up-sells will help your cause, non-profit, or political campaign raise more money.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Credit card processing fees apply to all tiers.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Full suite of tools and integrations for power fundraisers.
Best suited for large organizations with multiple chapters and agencies.
features: Support for multiple chapters and agencies
